website_summaries.verdict: If you’re in the market for an RC car that was made for risky driving and wild stunts, the lightweight Orbit Tumbler is exactly what you need.
pros: Controls designed for extreme tricks and crazy driving
Integrated roll cage rights car after tumbling
cons: Needs batteries to work, and they aren’t included

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I order my husband a remote control car every year for Christmas and they NEVER work. This year I though ordering from a name brand was the key. Nope! The car seemed to have power, but the remote never worked despite 3 battery changes. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Josie King

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for our 5 year old son. I was a little nervous that he wouldn't be quite old enough to figure it out. Boy was I wrong! He 'got' it right away. Our 3 year old son, 2 year old nephew and their 60 something Grandpa all love it! Grandpa even asked for his own! It's been run hard already (little boys aren't the best drivers yet!) and seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: it pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: this works great indoors and not so well outdoors. Two screws to hold battery cover on which is a pain to get to the batteries. Takes 6 batteries and does get expensive to operate... overall works well...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was the only thing my son wanted for his 9th Birthday bc his best friend also had one. Within 2 mins of playing with it parts of it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Junky

customer_reviews.title: GREAT REMOTE CONTROL FOR CHILDREN
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 4 years old and spend a lot time playing with the car remote control, not so easy to handle directions but that makes more fun.
customer_reviews.author: rcamay

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year grandson for his birthday, the remote control was easy for him to use. We all had fun playing with it very durable and goes very fast on sidewalk and grass. Lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old boy and 8 year old girl love this thing. They take it outside and it does fine in our yard area which is in the country and full of dirt and rocks and tall grass in places. It’s even been driven through thick mud and came out of it although I don’t recommend that. My dogs also get a kick out of chasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley

customer_reviews.title: good toy
customer_reviews.text: It's very fun for my. He plays with every day. con It eats battery
customer_reviews.author: little john

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf much better than 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure How long the batteries lasted but the kids ran out of gas before the cars lost power.
customer_reviews.author: reddog

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for a 4yo. It's a hit and runs really well. All the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog and my wife has long hair so having the wheels enclosed really helps the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Chatagnier

product_meta.title: Sharper Image Orbit Tumbler RC Car Toy for Kids, Remote Control Stunt Spinning Children’s Cars, Long Range 2.4 GHz Racing, 360 Power Flips
product_meta.description:
Action-packed racing and stunts

Built for high octane racing and stunts, the Sharper Image Orbit Tumbler will bring out the race car driver in you! Tear across the yard and send the car flying and tumbling with its unique cage design and race-ready neon green! Oversized tires help grip onto surfaces for optimal performance.

Long range, interference-free operation

The powerful built-in 2.4 GHz frequency allows long-range racing, so test your skills out in the open or build yourself an obstacle course! The 2.4 GHz frequency prevents outside interference—you can even race multiple Orbit Tumblers side by side!

Battery-powered fun anytime, anywhere

This RC runs on 6 “AA” batteries and 1 “9V” for on-the-go racing anytime, anywhere! Race around the house or yard, or take it out to the park or a friend’s. (Note: no batteries are included).

Features:

Unique protective cage enables 360 flips and turns 

Oversized textured tires for optimal grip 

Remote features stunt button for effortless stunt performance 

Powerful 2.4 GHz frequency enables long range operation and prevents radio interference 

Package Includes: 

RC Orbit Tumbler 

Remote control 

Ready to race and tumble your way to victory? Click “Add to Cart” NOW!
feature_bullets: ✔ RULE THE ROAD and turn heads wherever you go with the Sharper Image Orbit Tumbler RC Car! Be amazed by the vehicle’s sleek, eye-catching design, lighting speed, and extreme maneuverability!

✔ FUNCTION MEETS PERFORMANCE: Zoom away with friends and family with the full-function wireless remote control! The double joystick pilot-style remote gives drivers multi-directional operation and the ability to race multiple vehicles without interference!

✔ EFFORTLESSLY PERFORM STUNTS AND FLIPS: The Orbit Tumbler’s unique design features a rounded cage that allows it to perform 360-degree flips and somersaults! The built-in stunt button on the remote lets you easily perform acrobatics with a simple touch.
✔ LONG RANGE WITHOUT INTERFERENCE: The powerful 2.4 GHz frequency ensures long range and high-speed operation without outside interference, so get ready to tear up the asphalt!

✔ BATTERY-POWERED FOR ON-THE-GO FUN: The car requires 6 “AA” batteries and the remote requires 1 “9V” battery (none included), making it easy to set up and start driving! Kids can easily take the RC car with them for at-home or on-the-go play!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars20 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
